name: Helmaroc King
description: Boss fight against the Helmaroc king.

fields.name: Helmaroc King State
fields.description: The state or position of the Helmaroc King during the boss fight.

2.name: Stuck in Left Stone
2.description: Helmaroc King is stuck in the left stone.

3.name: Stuck in Right Stone
3.description: Helmaroc King is stuck in the right stone.

4.name: Point in GBA Left Stone
4.description: Helmaroc King is in the left stone at a certain point in GBA.

5.name: Point in GBA Right Stone
5.description: Helmaroc King is in the right stone at a certain point in GBA.

7.name: Flies Across Screen
7.description: Helmaroc King flies across the screen once.
